Distance MBA

Distance programs that keep you ahead

NMIMS Global distance MBA offers a wide range of courses to choose from. They offer 10 specialisations
4.7 (253 user ratings)
★★★★★ 4.7/5

NMIMS Global Distance MBA Learning Programs

With the evolving and tech-based education system, NMIMS Global Distance MBA Programs cater to a huge chunk of students from around 300+ cities in India. Narsee Monjee is an established private Business School set up in 1981 and the evolution of the institute has been dynamic.

 Considering the experience of the institute and how it has skillfully moved from paper-pen schooling to a full-fledged distance-based education system has attracted students in the past decade.

 The University is entitled by UGC-DEB and is a member of AIU, it is endorsed and graded ‘A’ and 3.95 CGPA by NAAC. Given that, how the university understands the needs of a wide group of students it is also awarded Category 1 by UGC.

 NMIMS Global Distance MBA programs are thoughtfully tailored according to the needs of working professionals. The mission behind offering distance MBA programs is that the professionals can learn and execute their learnings simultaneously, secondly, they can upskill while being in business or a day job.

Enquire Now

Don’t hesitate to contact us for more information

What does the NMIMS Global Distance MBA program offer?

NMIMS Global distance MBA offers a wide range of courses to choose from. They offer 10 specialisations:-

Operations Management

Business Management

Financial Management

Marketing Management

Banking and Finance Management

Retail Management

International Trade Management

Human Resource Management

Supply Chain Management

Information Technology and Systems Management

Get Free Counselling

Following are the highlights of this leading management program in India

Distance Weekend and Weekday Lectures to choose from

Lectures recorded for all Sessions

Personal Contact Programs for clearing doubts

Mobile App in addition to the NMIMS Student Portal

Guest Lectures from Industry Experts

Exams have MCQs as well as Descriptive questions

Support in the form of Email, Call, and also WhatsApp

EMI and Loan Facility for completing the programme

Get Free Counselling

Programs Of Your Choice

NMIMS Global Distance Learning offers a six-month certificate program, a one-year diploma program, and a two-year MBA program. NGASCE provides a comprehensive choice of courses in all areas of IT and Management Education to aspiring young minds. Fees for NMIMS Distance Learning MBA can be paid in monthly instalments using credit cards issued by Indian banks.

Corporate Acceptance

Our team works with a number of companies to provide their employees with NMIMS Distance MBA programs. Indigo Airlines, American Express, Cipla, Emerson Network Power (I) Ltd., Bajaj Finserv, Jet Airways, Vodafone, Eureka Forbes, IBM, Genpact, Metro, and Accenture, among others, have partnered with us to provide management training to their staff.

Exam Centers

Exams for NMIMS Global Distance Learning are held in Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Bhopal, Bhubaneswar, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Gurugram, Guwahati, Hyderabad, Indore, Jaipur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Mumbai, Nagpur, Nashik, Navi Mumbai, New Delhi, Noida, Patna, Pune, Raipur, Rajkot, Surat, Thane, Vadodara, and Vadodara, subject to the final

Why Should You Opt For The Program?

NMIMS Global School for Continuing Education is India’s Best University for Distance MBA, having been founded by the legendary NMIMS (Deemed to be University). The journey has been exciting and rewarding, from being the country’s premier distance-learning institution in the twentieth century to creating a 21st-century education platform.

NMIMS GLOBAL FORTE: NMIMS is one of India’s top ten business schools, with outstanding corporate partnership, recognition, and acceptance. The distance MBA course provided by the institute through distance medium stands as one of its kind. When students explore options in India on MBA in distance education or part time India, they find that the program from NMIMS comes with unique features like mentorship, career advancement services, industry aligned curriculum and etc.

  • 1,25,000+ Active Students
  • 27000+ Alumni
  • Students from 600+ locations

Along with these specializations NMIMS Global Distance MBA Program offers, 1 on 1 mentorship “Career Development Services” and Alumni Portal which helps the students to expand their network and keep up to date with job openings. This Alumni’s Portal is offered free of cost by the end of the 3rd semester.

Benefits of Doing Distance MBA
from NMIMS

  • NMIMS Global Awards & Accreditations
  • NMIMS offers Distance MBA in 10 most sought-after specialisations like Financial Management, Business Management, Operations and Human Resources.
  • The teaching-learning is facilitated through an interactive Learning Management System as well as Live Lectures.
  • The curriculum of the Distance MBA programme is curated keeping in mind the present industry standards.
  • The program has a helpful faculty that assists students at every step of their program, ensuring a smooth learning process.

NMIMS Distance MBA Admission Process

To register for NMIMS Distance MBA program, the students have to fill the registration form and pay the admission processing fee. For the same, the students have to visit the Authorised Enrollment Partner Office.

Documents required for the documentation process are as follows:

  • Academic documents
  • Identity proof like Aadhar Card, Voter Id or any other Govt issued ID proof
  • Documents for work experience (if any)
  • Passport size photographs

All the documents will be assessed by the counsellor at the Authorised Enrollment Partner’s office. After the authentication, students have to pay the Distance MBA fees. NMIMS will then verify all the documents and grant a student number to the student. applicant.

Hiring Partners Process

NMIMS Global has onboarded various multinational companies, corporations and start-ups across industries & geographies as hiring partners to provide students and alumni with opportunities that push their potential.

NMIMS distance MBA program bestows outstanding placement opportunities to its students with two modes of placement services. Free Alumni Portal: The students get access to the free alumni portal which they can access by the end of 3rd semester. They can look for jobs, and network with alumni and managers of major companies. Career Development Services: NMIMS Global also offers paid Career Development Services wherein an industry expert mentors the students and helps them prepare for job interviews and hone their soft skills. They also get access to learning modules, online resources and mock interviews.

Summary: NGA-SCE Distance MBA Program

Institute / University Name NMIMS Global Access School for Continuing Education
Course Name Distance MBA
Course Type Master Program
Duration Minimum 2 Years- Maximum 4 Years
Mode of Learning ODL Mode (Open & Distance Learning)
Ratings NAAC A+
Approved by UGC-DEB and AICTE
Specializations 10 Specialisations. Marketing, Finance, Human Resources, Information Technology and Systems Management, Business Management, International Trade, Supply Chain, Operations, Retail Management Banking and Finance
Fee Structure INR Rs. 1,68,000 for complete course
Eligibility Criteria Bachelor’s Degree (10+2+3) in any discipline from any recognised University or an equivalent degree recognised by Association of Indian Universities (AIU) with minimum 50% marks at Graduation Level.
Average Salary Offered INR 8.56 lakhs per annum
Employment Roles HR Manager, Marketing Manager, Business Development Manager, Operations Manager, Business Analyst (IT), Senior Business Analyst, Financial Analyst, SAP Consultant, Marketing Executive, etc.
Admission Drive January and July
Examination Slots April, June, September and December
Payment Facility Loan & EMI
Examination Method Online Assignment and Online Examination
Placement NMIMS have a network of 500+ hiring partners

FAQ’s –Working Professionals: NGA-SCE ODL Education Programs

Read on to find out the answers to all of your questions and to sign up for one of our award-winning NMIMS NGA-SCE Distance Learning Programs.

Why select NMIMS Global ODL MBA?

NMIMS Global is among the top and prestigious Business Schools and competes with the education of IIMs. The university is accredited by UGC-DEB and according to 2021 stats NIRF has the university at 22.
NMIMS Global has crafted their distance MBA courses especially for working professionals. There is a course for everyone since they offer 10 specializations. Along with the distance MBA course they provide one on one mentorship.
NMIMS NGA-SCE distance courses help elevate your career path and in order to do that NMIMS Global provides “Career Development Services” which is a 5-step model and it focuses on skill development. Industry expert mentors are assigned to help the students during the duration of the course. They also allot 3 teachers per subject for the smooth working and assistance for students.
Every year 10,000+ students enroll in NMIMS NGA-SCE distance programs which has helped them up skill and land their dream jobs.
To learn more about these courses, reach out to us at +91-8700283898

Is NMIMS Global a good choice for a distance MBA program?

NMIMS Global is one of the most prominent business schools in the country, competing with IIMs in terms of education. The institution is entitled by the UGC-DEB, and according to NIRF statistics for 2021, it is ranked 22nd.

NMIMS NGA-SCE distance MBA programmes are designed specifically for working people. Because they offer ten specialisations, there is a course for everyone. They provide one-on-one mentoring in addition to the distance MBA programme.

NMIMS distance courses may help you advance in your profession, and to do so, NMIMS NGA-SCE offers “Career Development Services,” a five-step strategy that focuses on skill development. Throughout the course, industry professional mentors are provided to assist the students. They also assign three teachers to each topic to ensure seamless operation and help.

Every year, more than 10,000 students enrol in NMIMS NGA-SCE distance programmes, which have assisted them in upskilling and landing dream jobs.

To learn more about these courses, reach out to us at +91-8700283898

How many specialisations are available through the NMIMS Global Distance MBA program?

NMIMS Global offers a wide range of courses in their distance MBA programs. They offer 10 specialisations:-
1. Marketing Management
2. Business Management
3. Financial Management
4. Human Resource Management
5. International Trade Management
6. Banking and Finance Management
7. Supply Chain Management
8. Operations Management
9. Retail Management
10. Information Technology and System Management

They have created industry-specialised curriculum given that the University is Autonomous in nature hence they supervise and refine it as per the need. There is a course for everyone and for students belonging to any stream.

To learn more about these Professional Courses, reach out to us at +91-8700283898

What are the NMIMS NGA-SCE Executive MBA Fees for Working Professional Programs?

NMIMS Global Executive MBA program is created for working individuals with the goal of imparting essential business skills in the corporate sector. The duration of the course is 24-months.

This course is offered in 5 specialisations: –
1. Marketing
2. Digital Marketing
3. Leadership and Strategy
4. Operations and Structure
5. Applied Science

The complete program fee is INR 4,75,000 and a 20% concession is given to our armed forces.
An initial amount of Rs. 10,000/ from the program fee will be collected at the time of registration.

To have more insights into the this Working professional Course, reach out to us at +91-8700283898

What does the NMIMS Global Bachelor program offer?

In the distance mode NMIMS Global offers 2 distance courses i.e. :-
1. BBA
2. BCOM

NMIMS Global bachelor program admissions:-
Duration and Eligibility: – 3 years;
● HSC (10+2) in any discipline from a recognized board with minimum 50%
● HSC (10+2) in any discipline from a recognized board with 45% and minimum 2 years work experience
● SSC (10) + 3 years Diploma recognized by AICTE with 55%

Fee Structure:-
● Program fee for NMIMS BBA admission:-
Rs. 18,000 per Semester
Exam Fee: Rs. 600 per Paper
● Program fee for NMIMS BCOM admission:-
Rs. 25,000 per Semester
Exam Fee: Rs. 600 per Paper

Does NMIMS NGA-SCE offer graduation programs via distance learning?

NMIMS NGA-SCE does provide Graduate Courses via distance mode. They have two graduate courses i.e BBA and BCOM. The Bachelors programs are designed to prepare students for a career in management by focusing on their holistic growth.

Bachelor program admissions:-
Duration and Eligibility:- 3 years;
● HSC (10+2) in any discipline from a recognized board with minimum 50%
● HSC (10+2) in any discipline from a recognized board with 45% and minimum 2 years work experience
● SSC (10) + 3 years Diploma recognized by AICTE with 55%

Fee Structure:-
● Program fee for BBA admission:-
Rs. 18,000 per Semester
Exam Fee: Rs. 600 per Paper
● Program fee for BCOM admission:-
Rs. 25,000 per Semester
Exam Fee: Rs. 600 per Paper

Which university offers the best MBA distance learning program?

Students now have a better understanding of the need on MBA and hence they are looking to about the finest colleges that offer an distance MBA, since the programme has grown in popularity due to its industrial relevance. In India, in particular, distance MBA is in high demand since it allows people to continue working while still receiving quality education from the comfort of their own homes.

Over the decade there are 100+ universities that have started offering distance MBA but the question is how many can provide industry-relevant education or give assistance in job search.
Only a few Indian institutions should be on one’s list, such as IIMs, XLRI, Symbiosis, and Narsee Monjee.

The main reason for this is that, in addition to providing high-quality education, these institutions also give 1 on 1 mentorship and guide the students at every step during the course like NMIMS Global does. They also assign three industry-experts to each topic.

To know more about these prestigious universities feel free to contact us and learn more about what they have to offer in terms of education and placement assistance call us on +91-8700283898

What is NMIMS Distance MBA program Fee structure?

NMIMS offers an affordable Distance MBA degree with a variety of options available for students to pay their respective fees.

The updated NMIMS distance MBA fee structure is:
INR 1,68,000 Pro MBA Course
INR 1,44,000 Prime MBA Course

There are 3 options to make NMIMS distance MBA fee:
Full Fee Payment: Students have the option to pay the whole fee amount in one time.
Pay yearly: Students can pay the MBA course fee annually with a payment of INR 91,000 (Pro course) and INR 79,000 (Prime) every year.
Semester-wise payment: Students can opt for this option for convenient fee payments of INR 48,000 (Pro course) and 42,000 (Prime) per semester.

The University offers special incentives to our armed forces with a 20% concession on the program fee.

Pro: The Pro mode allows students to access live-interactive lectures as well as view recorded lectures
Prime: The Prime delivery mode allows students to view recorded lectures
Prime +: The Prime+ mode allows students to choose access to live-interactive lectures of their choice.

To get complete information on these courses reach out to us at +91-8700283898

How are exams conducted for distance MBA in NMIMS?

The maximum marks for TEE (Distance/ Diploma/ Certificate) is 70 marks and the exam duration is 2.5 hours. Out of the total 70 marks, 50 marks are for multiple choice questions and the remaining 20 marks are for two descriptive questions worth 10 marks each. In the MCQ section, there are 34 MCQ-type questions worth 0.5 marks each. Other than that, there are 25 questions worth 1 mark each and 4 questions worth 2 marks each.
The students have to pay an exam fee, that is, INR 600/-.

What is eligibility criteria For NMIMS Distance MBA?

NMIMS offers flexible eligibility criteria for students aspiring to pursue a distance MBA. The following options are available for MBA Aspirants:-
Bachelor’s Degree (10+2+3) in any discipline from any recognised University or an equivalent degree recognised by Association of Indian Universities (AIU) with minimum 50% marks at Graduation Level.

Is it possible to pay for NMIMS NGA-SCE distance MBA program in instalments?

Yes, the university gives the liberty to make the payment in instalments.

The updated fee structure of distance MBA is:-
INR 168,000 Pro MBA Course
INR 144,000 Prime MBA Course

There are 3 options to make this payment:-
1. Full Fee Payment
2. Pay yearly : INR 91,000 Pro || INR 79,000 Prime ( No. of Years 2)
3. Semester-wise payment : INR 48,000 Pro || INR 42,000 Prime (No. of Semesters 4)

The university also gives financial assistance to aspiring students.
To learn more about these courses, reach out to us at +91-8700283898

What makes NMIMS NGA-SCE Distance Education a good MBA option?

Around 10,000 students, every year, enrol in NMIMS NGA-SCE distance learning program due to several reasons such as: –

1. Accreditations – NMIMS NGA-SCE is entitled by UGC-DEB and ranked 22 by NIRF 2021. The University is endorsed by NAAC with grade ‘A+’ and 3.95 CGPA. According to Outlook and ET Business School the university is ranked 4 and 6 respectively.
2. Education – NMIMS NGA-SCE provides industry – specialised education given that the university is Autonomous hence they keep updating their curriculum as and when needed.
3. Career Guidance – During the duration of the course an industry specialist will be assigned to assist you with personality development and crack your interview under their “Career Development Services’ and students also get access to Alumni Portal.

To learn more about NMIMS Global distance MBA reach out to us at +91-8700283898

Is NMIMS NGA-SCE a suitable place to get a distance MBA?

NMIMS NGA-SCE is an excellent fit to pursue your distance MBA program. It is one of the most prominent business schools in the world, competing with IIMs in terms of education.

NMIMS NGA-SCE distance MBA programmes are designed specifically for working people. Because they offer ten specialisations, there is a course for everyone. They provide one-on-one mentoring in addition to the distance MBA program i.e. “Career Development Service” along with access to Alumni Portal where students can look for job opportunities which is the ultimate goal of this distance MBA program.

NMIMS NGA-SCE distance courses help elevate your career path with a 5-step model and it focuses on skill development. Industry expert mentors are assigned to help the students during the duration of the course. They also alot 3 teachers per subject for the smooth working and assistance for students.

The University is also well accredited by NAAC with grade ‘A’ and 3.95 CGPA. It is entitled by UGC-DEB and ranked 22 by NIRF 2021. The university has left no stone unturned to assist their students and make their process smooth and pragmatic.

To learn more about these courses, reach out to us at +91-8700283898

Is NMIMS NGA-SCE Distance MBA eligible for the UGC exam?
If a student has cleared distance MBA, he/she is eligible to appear for the UGC exam. However, a minimum score of 55% is compulsory.

 

Is NMIMS NGA-SCE Distance Learning DEB approved?
Yes, NMIMS NGA-SCE Distance MBA has a DEB entitled and it is allowed to provide distance education.

 

Which Distance MBA program in India is the best?

The best MBA course depends upon from which university you pursue your distance MBA course. Universities like NMIMS NGA-SCE provide complete assistance during the course as well as in placements.

NMIMS NGA-SCE is a tier 1 institute entitled by UGC and ranked 22 by NIRF 2021 stats.

The university offers a full package of services at affordable rates. It provides “Career Development Services” which is 5-step model and the students also get access to alumni portal.

The admissions are on roll, secure your seats now to elevate your career path to the next level.
Reach out to us at +91-8700283898 to broadly learn about these distance courses

Why is NMIMS NGA-SCE Distance Learning such a good option for distance learning?

NMIMS NGA-SCE is among the Top 10 Business Schools inIndia. Around 10,000 students, every year, enrol in distance learning program due to several reasons such as: –

Accreditations – NMIMS NGA-SCE is entitled by UGC-DEB and ranked 22 by NIRF 2021. The University is endorsed by NAAC with grade ‘A+’ and 3.95 CGPA. According to Outlook and ET Business School the university is ranked 4 and 6 respectively.

Education – NMIMS NGA-SCE provides industry – specialized education given that the university is Autonomous hence they keep updating their curriculum as and when needed.

Career Guidance – During the duration of the course an industry specialist will be assigned to assist you with personality development and crack your interview under their “Career Development Services’ and students also get access to Alumni Portal.

To learn more about NMIMS Global distance MBA reach out to us at +91-8700283898

Can I receive a loan to pay for my NMIMS Global Distance MBA tuition?
Yes, you can absolutely avail loan facility. For comprehensive information feel free to call us on +91-8700283898

 

Is the NMIMS NGA-SCE Distance MBA accredited by the AICTE?
Yes, Distance MBA program of NMIMS NGA-SCE is entitled by AICTE.
Is the NMIMS Global distance valid for the WES?
Yes, the degree issued by NMIMS Global is absolutely valid and accepted for by WES (World Education Services)
Does NMIMS Global offer a distance learning BBA or BCOM program?

Yes, NMIMS Global does offer BBA and BCOM via distance mode.
NMIMS Global distance programs provide industry relevant self-instructional studies along with distance interactive lecture delivery and future assistance.
The bachelor courses are designed for freshers in such a way as to give them practical and skill based education. Via NMIMS Global distance learning Bachelor courses the students have the liberty to opt for other courses or hobbies as well.
